cp21:0.4_0: The expression of appreciation for the procedure with these words
cp21:1.2_0: the son of a king’s son.
cp21:1.4_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency.
cp21:2.3_0: I paid homage at her mother and father,
cp21:4.2_0: remembering the instructions of the Buddha:
cp21:5.3_0: I was not able to draw up
cp21:6.1_0: A mother wouldn’t give me her life,
cp21:6.2_0: They don’t give me a Dhamma talk,
cp21:6.4_0: That’s why I should give up overcome even by king.”
cp21:7.1_0: First: compassion is the first absorption.
